description: The Asp (Cleo Nefertiti) is a former supervillain in the Marvel Comics universe, and was a member of the Serpent Society and BAD Girls, Inc.. She was created by Mark Gruenwald and Paul Neary, and first appeared in Captain America vol. 1 #310.
name: Asp
powers: projects "venom bolts" of bioelectric energy that can paralyze or kill living beings.
